author: jdixl

changelog.release_notes:
Step by step for pebble time has had a little bit of a polish.

Highlight include:
* Short vibrate alert when Bluetooth is disconnected.
* Show typical steps instead of calories.
* Steps turn green when you are on par or ahead of typical steps.

Make the most of the health data hiding on your pebble!

Displays Step count and Calories (kcal) burned as soon as they are updated. As a bonus this watch face also displays the time, battery level and Bluetooth indicator.

Careful consideration has been taken to ensure the watch face is super readable.

Enjoy!

description:

Enjoy!
